note: This data is expressed in 2011 [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation). Following an update, World Bank PIP now uses 2017 international-$ for its poverty and inequality data [available here](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/daily-mean-income).
title: Mean income or consumption per day
subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
